title: Assassin Rework Comes out Tomorrow?
body: Does the Assassin Rework come out tomorrow? If not, when does it?

replies.body:
Planned release is around midnight tomorrow for the NA server (so about 24 hours from now). Some other regions will get the patch earlier based off the deploy order (I think Russia's up first, though wouldn't swear to it). 

As a general note as with other pre-seasons it's likely that, due to the sheer number of things being changed and the way those things are interconnected, balance on at least a couple of things will be noticeably off. That will mean at least some of the assassins for example will probably need buffs or nerfs pretty quickly. We'll be working to address whatever crops up in the next patch, odds are though that some champs will look way too weak or way too strong for a little bit though. 

TLDR: Balance on some stuff will probably be significantly off for a couple of weeks, we'll be working on it quickly.
This may be a little greedy, but will that include replays?

I don't believe so, though that's not a feature I'm directly involved with myself. My understanding is that Replays are dependent on the new client, so the timelines for that will govern when they're generally available.
Any comments on Shaco or Akali?

> [{quoted}](name=ff4sk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Upa4TiFq,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2016-11-08T09:12:51.010+0000)
>
> Any comments on Shaco or Akali?

I'm guessing they're saving them for the 6.23 patch notes. I have the feeling that buffs will likely be in order, so the patch notes should at least explain why they thought it was a good idea to buff whatever they decide to buff. 

(But I'm kinda hoping that Akali's W changes are on the table for getting rolled back)
so it comes out tuesday or wednesday?
I'm soo looking forward to the preseason mayhem! :D

Hey Meddler,

Sorry to hi-jack your comment, but this thread over there http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/AhWsVnAa-meddler-we-need-to-talk-about-resolve-masteries-before-the-end-of-preseason has generated a good amount of discussion and generally positive feedback. There is a TL;DR and all ;)

You mind having a look and updating us on your team's thoughts?

>(I think Russia's up first, though wouldn't swear to it).

90% sure OCE gets the patch first. The patch comes to OCE 5 hours before Russia from what I can see, which makes sense because it is already 7pm on Tuesday the 8th in Melbourne and Sydney.

I could be wrong if the assassin changes don't role out with the patch though.
Could you post where you got that from? I'm curious.

> [{quoted}](name=BananaSlayerAMO,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Upa4TiFq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-08T03:35:43.948+0000)
>
> Could you post where you got that from? I'm curious.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/11/patch-622-server-maintenance-announced.html

Don't get me wrong, so the preseason including the Assasin-etc-etc-patch will be realeased in like 10 hours from now on in NA? 
Does EUW get the patch at the same time, earlier or later?
